word:
Then I aroused from my unconsciousness, and for a while could not think where I was. My pen was still in my hand. The words were spoken to me: "This might have been. All this the Lord was waiting to do for His people. All heaven was waiting to be gracious." I thought of where we might have been had thorough work been done at the last General 
                                                                           106
Conference, and agony of disappointment came over me as I realized that what I had witnessed was not a reality. 
                                                                -
